original_text: And in those days, when the number of the disciples was multiplied, there arose a murmuring of the Grecians against the Hebrews, because their widows were neglected in the daily ministration.
korean_text: 그 때에 제자가 더 많아졌는데 헬라파 유대인들이 자기의 과부들이 매일의 구제에 빠지므로 히브리파 사람을 원망하니

sentences.original_text: when the number of the disciples was multiplied
there arose a murmuring of the Grecians

sentences.korean_translation: 왜냐하면 그들의 과부들이 돌봄을 받지 못했기 때문이다
